title: Enhancing OLED emitter efficiency through increased rigidity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8135-8144
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07937F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mahendra Godi, Hyukmin Kwon, Sangwook Park, Sunwoo Park, Hayoon Lee, Kiho Lee, Jongwook Park
Three new blue materials, TPI-InCz, PAI-InCz, and CN-PAI-InCz, have been developed. Among the three materials, CN-PAI-InCz showed the highest external quantum efficiency of 3.31% with fast hole mobility of 1.50 × 10−3 cm2 V−1 s−1.
